topic: Do you prefer dark, milk, or white chocolate? Explain your choice.
Describe your most memorable chocolate experience that you ever had in your life.
If you could create a new chocolate flavor, what would it be and why?
What is the most unusual chocolate combination you've tried?
If you were a chocolatier, what would your signature chocolate be?
Share a story about a time when chocolate made a bad day better.
What is your favorite chocolate dessert and why?
If you could visit any country known for its chocolate, where would you go and what would you do?
What is the best chocolate gift you've ever received?
If chocolate could talk, what story would it tell about you?
